A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A long\, expensive\, poorly made film.  Weak portrayals of existing characters\, badly introduced new characters\, forgettable dialog\, and the most stupid villains ever conceived.  What would be merely disappointing in a stand alone space opera becomes unforgivable as part of the beloved Star Wars property.  Gaping plot holes are papered over with too much CGI.  Rian Johnson and JJ Abrams are capable of far better than this.  The film should take a Mulligan and be done over.
